original_title: UNP lifts suspensions on Harin Fernando and Manusha Nanayakara
original_body_lines: The Working Committee of the United National Party (UNP) has decided to lift the suspensions imposed on Harin Fernando and Manusha Nanayakara, and to reinstate them in the party’s Working Committee.
The decision has been arrived at following a meeting of the UNP’s Working Committee.
